lead_paragraph: KING--Dr. Katherine Rees, 84, a psychoanalyst in New York City died of Alzhiemer's disease at Mary Manning Walsh Hospice on Monday, February 29, 2016. Dr. Rees studied with Anna Freud at the Child Clinic in Hampstead, London. She was a founder of the Child Program at the New York Freudian Society and she saw patients until 2013 when she became ill. Dr. Rees was educated at Oxford University, The London School of Economics, and Norfolk University. She moved to New York in 1965 and earned a PhD in psychology in 1985, at City University in New York. Dr. Rees is survived by her loving husband Charles, her brother Tony, and her twin brother, Alan. A memorial service is planned for some time in April. At John Krtil Funeral Home (212-744-3084) on First Ave and 70th Street in NYC. For information regarding the memorial service, call Charles King at 212-362-6964. 1/3
